264694021920853876:
If you can't run very fast
in the last spurt, you
might lack speed.
2914511212757099349:
Dropping positions at the
end of the race may signal
a lack of stamina.
5092726315954254701:
If you feel like you're not
moving forward very well,
you might want more power.
13424869890721458808:
If catching up at the end
is a challenge, you may not
have enough guts.
17593247050019687440:
It seems high wisdom
improves positioning and
skill usage.
1799633110618496311:
If you run out of Money or
Support Points, try running
in the Daily Race.
7271091049103945296:
Strengthening support cards
and horse girls is quite
important for winning.
9740601218688937978:
Sometimes luck plays a part
in races, such as weather
and race developments…
18158059115974718805:
You can get better support
effects by raising the Lv
of your support cards.
16247562601747616267:
Uncapping and strenghtening
support cards can net you
powerful support effects.
512839029639212542:
Note that "Motivation
Bonus" also increases the
negative effect!
17405037886528810865:
"Friendship Bonus"
increases the effectiveness
of friendship training.
11004085994676181464:
The "Stat Bonus" type
support effects will be
effective during training.
14504697545767688800:
"Training Effectiveness
Up" will be effective in
any training.
3737160633134639639:
"Initial Stat Increase"
effects allow you to start
training with higher stats.
9098014342611344866:
"Initial Bond Gauge Up"
is useful to raise your
bond gauge quickly.
1349607545609879001:
"Race Bonus" and "Fan
Count Bonus" also apply to
target races.
11242306555653285725:
"Race Bonus" is
recommended when you want
to gain SkillPt.
10302763012371833802:
"Hint Lv. Bonus"
increases the amount hint
levels go up.
12072499810051938831:
"Hint Rate Up" will make
it easier for hint events
to occur.
14258306518810804488:
"Specialty Rate Up" increases 
appearance rate in their 
training specialty.
7461282524892357085:
"Event Recovery Amount
Up" increases energy
recovery in events.
966000006997619925:
"Event Effect Increase"
will increase the effects
obtained from events.
6874215436703613294:
"Failure Rate Down" makes
it harder to fail a
training with that card.
2490308252690385702:
"Energy Discount" lowers
energy consumed when you
train together.
15075748376533734586:
"Wisdom Training Recovery" 
recovers lots of energy when 
friendship training.
7757845724849583535:
An orange bond gauge
enables friendship
training.
14390618416793676249:
It's even more effective
when multiple friendship
trainings overlap.
1431643036058856734:
Events from chosen support
cards, will occur much
more easily.
8364196955281285597:
Sometimes you'll get an
event for a support card
you don't have organized.
15665810776152684288:
You cannot include support
cards of the horsegirl you
are training.
15724296870027102997:
Unwanted cards can be 
converted to horseshoes, 
exchangeable for items 
in the store.
1746029905742358702:
"Training Events" in a
card's details lists
obtainable skill hints.
17093174572968385987:
Horsegirl's Awakening Lv
can be increased with
Upgrade Items and Money.
8898609611471958785:
Higher Awakening Lvs grant
your Uma more skills at the
start of training.
7497780866102000621:
Upgrade Items can be obtained 
by winning a race of GIII or 
higher in training.
115152429653870982:
By collecting pieces of the
same horse girl you can
develop her talents.
8147216209960149141:
Uncapping your horsegirl 
increases the Lv of her unique 
skills and base stats.
9258247054162306831:
Uma Musu receive their Race
Outfit when uncapped to ★3
or higher.
7991765368157319868:
Convert unwanted pieces
into clovers, exchangeable
for items in the store.
10889585651571641274:
Hall of Fame horse girls
can be used in inheritance,
team arena, and races.
16161810921616977783:
Once a Hall of Fame Uma
Musu has been transferred,
she cannot be recovered.
16391484917802201061:
An Uma's score in training
is calculated from the
value of stats and skills.
3615081413840010775:
Uma Musu entering the Hall
of Fame, gain chance and
status based factors.
10659312608493001394:
Factors have a rarity, and
the more ★'s, the more
effective.
15256897902609807665:
The better you do in
training, the easier it is
to acquire more factors.
16603202438425020992:
Some factors have an effect
on the inheritance event at
the start of training.
9225578880558425747:
When the basic ability
factor is activated, the
parameter is increased.
2115522492511031012:
Aptitude factors increase
aptitude for surface,
distance, or running style.
14501823247184241930:
Skill factors grant you
the skill or increase
its Hint Lv.
5322523811352473430:
When the race factor is 
activated, the parameter and 
skill Hint Lv is increased.
6817626165071984076:
Inheritance factors of
already acquired skills
increase status.
2257159650406851406:
Parent horsegirls are not
lost in inheritance, so use
them without fear.
10626846480670271697:
You can rent parent Uma
Musume from your friends
for Money.
9731313988881740682:
Horsegirl compatibility
is marked from highest:
◎ > ○ > △.
17878782558580575927:
Class/roommates, family,
and such relationships may
affect compatability…
5454762410442207958:
Sometimes, it is useful to 
refer to the training info of 
friend's "Main Uma Musu".
8602893093590326574:
"Kakari" will cause panic
and HP loss. Higher wisdom
lowers the chance.
11693923287372137095:
Good lane changes ease
dodging Uma Musu to
move forward.
3065534524808483032:
Speed is especially
important in short
distance races.
7297509514568852472:
Speed and power are
especially important in a
mile race.
11732165135484019780:
In middle-distance races,
well-balanced basic
abilities are important.
8245534071154455448:
Stamina and guts are
especially important in
long distance races.
8938088775028531737:
The marks in the paddock
indicate appraisal in the
order of ◎>○>▲>△.
8374829407457834912:
Going out increases
motivation and recovers
energy.
11693032712072583962:
Maybe a trip to the shrine
will help you get rid of
bad conditions?
13710206530620981799:
If you bonded with reporter
Otonashi, after the URA
Finals …?
15675905624076965138:
It's easier to pass on
feelings when the parent
Uma Musu are a good match.
6600908163960268998:
Support card events can
also increase the Hint LV
of rare skills!
11304223448624786714:
The school's bulletin
board (Home) holds info
about horsegirls.
12131087884220413552:
Short distance means 1400m
or less, and mile is from
1401m to 1800m.
4058849185751941114:
Middle distance is between
1801m and 2400m, while long
distance starts from 2401m.
3351048817580865389:
Rain/snow worsen the going; 
good > yielding > soft > 
heavy, making it difficult 
to run.
5371164447484026781:
The grade of races follows
this order: GI > GII > GIII
> OP > Pre-OP.
5997042663806854807:
The higher the grade of the 
race, the more likely strong 
horsegirls will gather.
11441068750459981885:
G3, G2, and G1 are 
"big prize" graded races, G1
being the most prestigious.
16355433092839279253:
Unique skill factors can be
acquired once your Uma Musu
is ★3 or higher.
12435700560796916161:
Courses for the URA Finals
are based on which you ran
the most during training.
2489710301390585569:
Spring Senior Triple Crown: 
Osaka Hai, Tennoushou 
(Spring), Takarazuka Kinen.
15451218038100883340:
Triple Tiara is the

Tennoushou (Fall), Japan C,
Arima Kinen.
2397625255689322123:
Classic Triple Crown:
Satsuki Sho, Nippon Derby,
Kikka Sho.

If you don't want to skip
unread events, you can set
this in the options.

You can also gain
unobtained Uma-Musume by
using pieces.

with which your basic skills 
increase with training.

As Hint Lv increases, Skill
